entry.title: $2700 // FURNISHED FLEX-2BR APARTMENT AT 82ND & 1ST AVE - NO FEE BY OWNER
entry.content:
Up for rent is our fully furnished apartment on the top floor of a 5th floor walk-up on a tree-lined side street in the Upper East Side. The unit is a large (630 sq ft), bright and sun-drenched, flex-2 bedroom apartment. It is conveniently located with easy access to restaurants, stores, parks, and public transit. The apartment is two blocks away from the 2nd Ave subway line. For medical students, residents, fellows, and attendings, it is within walking distance to Lennox Hill Hospital, Weill Cornell, New York Presbyterian, Hospital for Special Surgery (HSS).

This apartment is great for individuals, couples or families who appreciate more space. The neighborhood is quiet, family-friendly and extremely safe. On Saturday mornings, there's a farmer's market right across the street bringing fresh produce literally right to your doorstep.

This is a flex-2 bedroom apartment with a large living room, dining alcove area, and a full kitchen. There is hardwood floor throughout. The apartment gets plenty of natural light and is well ventilated. The bedroom has a queen bed, nightstands, and dresser, for your use. The living room has a sofa that folds out to a full bed and a dresser. There is a single bed in the living area what makes this apartment great for 1-4 people. There are three closets, including two walk-in closets. There is also a coin operated washer and dryer in the basement.

NOTE: THE TV, SINGLE BED, BEDLINENS, BEDDING SHEETS, PILLOWS AND MULTIPLE KITCHENWARE DO NOT COME INCLUDED IN THE MONTHLY RENT RATE.

THESE ITEMS CAN BE BOUGHT FROM THE CURRENT TENANTS FOR AN ADDITIONAL 1 TIME FEE OF: $500
